Member Function Documentation

void ShelterAgencyTeam::act (  Time  now  )  [virtual]
 

Performs this team's actions.

A ShelterAgencyTeam's action pattern is as follows: When it becomes operational, it builds a Camp at its current location. For all following days the team moves all of the displaced, unsheltered people in the cell where the camp is located into the camp untilthe team's - and thereby the camp's - capcaity limit is met.

Parameters:
now The current simulation time.

Implements AgencyTeam.
